objects.text: Energy-efficient • Large capacity • Digital controls • Stackable design
Transform your laundry experience with modern technology and sleek design

product_details.name: Insignia Premium Washer & Dryer Set - Modern Laundry Solution for Your Home
product_details.description:
• Sleek white design with modern digital display interface
• Large capacity front-loading washer for efficient cleaning
• Energy-efficient heat pump dryer technology
• Multiple wash and dry programs with digital controls
• LED display showing cycle status and remaining time
• Convenient dial selector for easy program selection
• Matching set design for a coordinated laundry room look
• Space-saving stackable design option
• Advanced moisture sensors for precise drying
• Door windows for easy load monitoring
• Digital temperature and spin speed controls
• Energy Star certified for lower utility bills
• Quiet operation technology
• Durable stainless steel drum construction
• Smart diagnostics capability for maintenance

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a sleek modern layout set against a smooth gradient background with soft radial lighting and semi-transparent circular accents adding depth and polish. The composition is anchored by a bold top headline (`heading`) in uppercase blue text, emphasizing brand quality. Just below, the subheading (`subheading`) highlights the product category in a slightly lighter yet assertive blue tone. A standout red tagline (`tagline`) grabs attention and sets an urgent tone for the offer. Centered in the frame is a high-resolution image of the washer-dryer set (`product_image`). A concise bullet-style feature list (`features`) followed by a refined subtext description (`description`) communicates the key value points and design appeal. The price (`price`) is showcased in a standout red, large typeface, right above a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) in a bold blue rectangle containing white text (`cta`), inviting immediate interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: `#0054A6`
- Light Blue: `#1A75D2`
- Accent Red: `#E74C3C`
- CTA Blue: `#0066CC`
- Background Gradient: `#E6F2FF` to `#C5E1FF`
- Neutral Gray Text: `#333333`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a modern washer and dryer duo with a sleek, minimalistic aesthetic. Dominant colors include bright white (#FFFFFF) for the machine body, providing a clean and fresh look, and deep black (#101010) for the door and control panel areas, which adds contrast and focus. The digital displays feature soft blue (#00AEEF) and light gray text (#D8D8D8), giving a high-tech feel. The silver/metallic control knob (#C0C0C0) adds a touch of sophistication. The contrast between white and black ensures clarity and visual interest, while subtle blue highlights enhance the modern appeal. Use this palette for an effective advertisement banner.
